title: Sea vs Mountains
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Of course, the sea is a wonderful place too. There are many things that you can only do at the sea. But in the same way, there are also real pleasures that you can only experience at the mountains<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I get that much. But the sea is the birthplace of mankind right? There are ancient memories etched into our DNA that we just can’t resist<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Hmm…. That is a weak reasoning…. Even so, humanity has been alive for 200 thousand years. Being on land all that time means being surrounded by greenery, a place full of negative ions…. That’s right, won’t the mountains be a pleasant and comfortable place to spend time?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You’re bringing up human history?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>But you’re the one to bring it up first, Kanan…. However, at this rate it seems that we won’t reach a conclusion. Let’s ask a third party for their opinion on “Which is better, the sea or the mountains”.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ah, Ai-chan is just at the right place. Should we go ask Ai-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Ai…. Let’s not do that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Eh, why?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>If we ask Ai, she’ll probably say something along the lines of “Both the sea and the mountains are a fun place! But Ai-san also loves Harajuku!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>That does sound like something she would say….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
